Service Details: - Provides independent, affordable, second stage accommodation to women, with and without children, who demonstrate a financial need- NOW Canada offers 1, 2, and 3 bed units (some handicapped suites)- Amenities include security focused, camera monitored buildings, drug and alcohol free living, Tenant Support Worker assistance, 24 hour emergency assistance, laundry facilities at reduced cost, tenant activities, and access to NOW Canada programs and services
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upIf potential tenants have experienced addictions, a minimum of 10 months 'clean time' is required before applicants will be considered
Address & Map: 1720 Ethel StKelowna, BC     V1Y 2Y7View MapQuest Map
